item.title: When the going gets tough, you want a Douglasville Criminal Defense Attorney that is going to fight for you.
item.description:
When the going gets tough, you want a Douglasville Criminal Defense Attorney that is going to fight for you.

Criminal Defense Attorney Ed Napier understands the intricacies of the Douglas County Criminal Justice System. Â Ed handles case before all the courts in Douglas County and is capable of providing you with the assistance you need to make sure your case gets the best result possible.
